paper_info.author: Yuri Gil Dantas, Vivek Nigam, and Iguatemi E. Fonseca.
paper_info.title: An Adaptive Selective Defense for Application Layer DDoS Attacks
paper_info.citation: Yuri Gil Dantas, Vivek Nigam, and Iguatemi E. Fonseca. An Adaptive Selective Defense for Application Layer DDoS Attacks. In CTDSeg, 2016. Selected as a Candidate for the Prize of Best Master Thesis in Security in Brazil
